snippet.title: CANNONPISTOL | Official  Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the official  game reveal from smokeback studio .Forge your own path as the last Goldchest hunter! in a Boss rush hunting adventure ,Explore , build, battle in shine lost lands and skies to recover all gold lost till the last Goldchest beast falls!

Long before now, we thrived in harmony, a glittering golden paradise and shiny skies…until the beasts came. They descended like storms, devouring night and day, draining the lands of all its shine leaving our world sad and grey...

One by one, we fell to their greed...with the last shard of sacred ore we forged a weapon like no other the first cannon pistol!

#cannonpistolgame
